title: Happy Birthday+1 Hrant!
content:
Argh, missed by a day. But how sorry would I be if I spent my Sundays on Typophile as well? O:^)

Happy Birthday, Hrant, keep rocking the boat. I hope you had some fun celebrations with your family. Card coming up shortly. ;^)

 [‹ Emigre redesigns their Web site](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811074431/http:/typophile.com/node/20464 "Go to previous forum topic") [Norbert is older than dirt so wish the old geezer Happy Birthday!!! but late :-( ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811074431/http:/typophile.com/node/20790 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: Happy birthday, Hrant! Here’s to another good year…

Belated happy birthday Hrant  
Tim
Are you having a bouma-cake ? Happy Birthday, Hrant.

Happy, Happy, Hrant.  
_( I hope you had a nice one. )_

[Dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811074431/http:/www.dav.name/)

Tsnundĕ shnorhavor, Hrant, my fellow gemini.  
All best wishes for the coming year.

King for a Day!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811074431im_/http:/typophile.com/files/crown_hrant_3834.gif)

Happy Birthday Hrant :-)

ChrisL

**Conghrantulations!**

ƒ
Happy birthday, Hrandt!

Enjoy those birthdays while you can. It won’t be long before you are anticipating the next one making you qualify for the senior discount.  
; )  
Best wishes...

On an html note, looks like someone butchered their /strong

Feliz Cumpleaños from Echo Parque

peace
Happy Birthday, all the best for the coming year.
Happy Birthday, Hrant!

Hey, you guys are gonna keep doing this every year?! ;-)  
Many warm thanks, everybody.

BTW, I plan on starting to feel old in two years, I promise.

hhp

Entropy isn’t planned, it just sneaks up on you… :)

peace

“Entropy isn’t planned, it just sneaks up on you…”

Right now, Hrant is still a sinularity waiting for the big BANG!!! :-)

ChrisL
Hope you had fun! Best wishes for the year to come!
May your day have been spent consuming only the highest grade dark chocolate. :^) Happy belated, Hrant.
Happy belated birthday, Hrant! Just how old are you, BTW?

I don’t know about Hrant but I’m old enough to know not to answer that question… :)

peace

Happy Birthday, Hrant!

\> Just how old are you, BTW?  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/person/papazian/hrant/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811074431/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/papazian/hrant/ "http://www.myfonts.com/person/papazian/hrant/")  
(just don’t kill me :) )

I would have never thought myfonts would have filed you under person… :)

peace

Well, barely: my MyFonts person number is 666...

BTW, there’s this plan of attending the 24 Hours of LeMans  
with a bunch of Brit font freaks for my 40th... Anybody let  
me know if you’re game.

hhp
HBD Hrant, and Happy Father’s Day as well. Hope it was special.

This explains it all! Hrant and Che are both Geminis!  
Happy Birthday Hrant, hope the Empire gave you a break for a day. I hope you have many, many years of hranting ahead of you.

ER
happy birthday!
HB, HP!
Happy Birthday, and have fun at LeMans!
Feliz aniversário, Hrant!
i hope it was Hhapy!
Belated wishes for your happiness! Wow! Only one day late. Not toooo bad.

Oooopppps!  
Sorry I missed the party, been busy.  
Happy belated birthday and Fathers’ Day, Hrant!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811074431im_/http:/typophile.com/files/birthday_cake2_6718.gif)

Gee Norbert, now that really takes the cake :-)

ChrisL
Hope it’s Hrantastic!

Hrant,

We ripen, then we rot.

Some of us earlier than others. I speak from experience. Take care, and happy birthday kid.

Gerald Giampa, “the old guy”
Happy Birthday.

Congratulations Hrant, have a great year.

Héctor
